explains: n. 殖民者；殖民地开拓者；移入选民；移民

sentences.en: Others have seen us as a former colonizer intent on controlling your future.
sentences.cn: 另外有些人认为我们是意图控制你们未来的前殖民者。

sentences.en: We do not exploit the continent of Africa as a colonizer, and we do not want them to suffer from hungry.
sentences.cn: 我们不是以殖民者的身份去开拓非洲大陆的，我们也不希望他们挨饿。
